"Defeat all enemies!":
"A lot of enemies will appear.
Defeat as many as you can within the time limit.
Now... fight."

"You're doing well.
You've defeated about half of them.
Thank you for making such good progress."

"30 seconds left.
Keep doing your best until the end."

"Confirmed, all enemies defeated.
You did it... How wonderful!
Thank you very much!"

"Your time is up.
This training ends here.
Thank you very much."
